topThree.why: Agentic skills framework for coding agents — auto-activating TDD, subagent orchestration, structured dev methodology
Official Claude Code plugin marketplace — defines the plugin standard, opportunity to publish our skills
Open-source Claude Code competitor with free tier and multi-provider support

trends: Coding agent ecosystem maturing rapidly — plugins, skills, marketplaces
MCP becoming standard infrastructure (GitHub nav, Context7 trending, plugin configs)
Open-source Claude Code alternatives multiplying (Qwen Code, Gemini CLI, OpenCode)
Structured agentic dev methodologies emerging (Superpowers, GSD)
